column1: Little Goat Diner////I've visited 3 times now for breakfast and have yet to be let down be it by food
column2: service or overall experience. Their coffee is great (locally roasted)
column3: the booths are comfy and the menu is nothing short of amazing. I've had the corned beef hash and two omelets of the day
column5: you'll never wait as long as they say you will when you put your name in (bonus).
